strongs_def: to dispatch (from the subjective view or point of departure, whereas (as a stronger form of ) refers rather to the objective point or terminus ad quem, and G4724 (πέμπω) denotes properly, the orderly motion involved), especially on a temporary errand; also to transmit, bestow, or wield
outline:
1. to send
    1. to bid a thing to be carried to one
    2. to send (thrust or insert) a thing into another
